game.name: Pair It Up

messages.notHost: You are not the game host
messages.waitTime: Next guess can be attempted in

game.useLink: Use a link or input a room code to join a game
game.waitingForHost: Waiting for the host to start the game

info.aboutGame: Pair It Up game is about finding pairs between cards in play. Each card has a common symbol with any other card. Number of symbols on a card is adjusted to the number of players and number of cards in the game. Currently, two game modes are available to play:
info.classicGame: Be the first person to find a pair between your card and the card in play. After selecting a common symbol, the card goes to the person who chose the pair and replaces the previous card. The winner is the person with the most points.
info.hotPotatoGame: Harder of the game modes. Be the first to find a pair betwenn the card in play and a card of another player. After selecting a common symbol of another player's card, the card in play replaces his previous card. The winner is the person with the least points.
